data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 72,850 believers in Sulawesi Utara against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sulawesi Utara, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 72,850 believers in Sulawesi Utara.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sulawesi Utara, Indonesia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Sulawesi Utara, Indonesia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Sulawesi Utara, Indonesia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Gorontalo people. Make the Gorontalo people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Sulawesi Utara do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Sulawesi Utara, Indonesia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 72,850 believers in Sulawesi Utara to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Sulawesi Utara
location.cities_list: Manado, Tondano, Tomohon, Laikit, Laikit II (Dimembe), Lolayan
location.cities_list_w_pop: Manado (451,893), Tondano (33,317), Tomohon (27,624), Laikit, Laikit II (Dimembe) (8,000), Lolayan
